title: Can't compile due to UnsatisfiedLinkeError
body:
*If you aren't sure about your bug, you can always join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/HNmxvpm) and ask in #agora or #engineering!*

**Problem**

I pulled the most recent changes into my repository and now when I try to build I get this error:

```
Syntax error (UnsatisfiedLinkError) compiling at (/private/var/folders/6y/w9k_79p15491rnq2n47dbd800000gn/T/form-init5993237114313417430.clj:1:125).
Unable to load library 'Carbon': dlopen(libCarbon.dylib, 9): image not found

Full report at:
/var/folders/6y/w9k_79p15491rnq2n47dbd800000gn/T/clojure-2335083008348752876.edn
Error encountered performing task 'do' with profile(s): 'dev'
Suppressed exit
```

**Expected Behavior**

Expected to build.

**Dependencies**

[ Please specify your environment and software dependencies, with versions. ]

- Athens: (broken on any branches I have checked)

- browser: (not browser-related)

- JVM:
java version "11.0.2" 2019-01-15 LTS
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment 18.9
 (build 11.0.2+9-LTS)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM 18.9 (build 11.0.2+9-LTS, mixed mode)

- node.js: v12.16.1

**To Reproduce**

Pull most recent changes

Run `yarn`

Run `lein dev`

Full log here:


comments.body: Which version of Mac OS is this? @Bardia95

Big Sur

I ran `lein dev` twice and it worked on it, it broke randomly on the third time, unsure why. May have to go back to Catalina and try again.
I found that it broke when I switched from `bash` to `zsh` but I also re-tried from `bash` after re-downloading everything and it didn't work
Following up - did you get it to work in Catalina? This is probably an upstream compatibility issue with lein & Big Sur. Would you mind if I close this issue?
